refrain: Blessing and honour and glory be Thine
And glory be Thine, and glory be Thine
Blessing and honour and glory be Thine
For Thou art on the throne
For He is on the throne hallelujah!
Blessing and honour and glory be Thine
And glory be Thine, and glory be Thine
Blessing and honour and glory be Thine
For Thou art on the throne
